process.label: How We Engage
process.title: We become part of your team, not outside consultants.
process.subtitle: Here's what that looks like.

steps.title: We integrate into your existing teams
steps.description: We join your communication structures, meetings, and improvement systems. No parallel workstreams  - we work inside your operation.

steps.title: We work onsite as needed, remote for efficiency
steps.description: We're on the floor when it matters  - building solutions with your people. We work remotely when it makes sense  - keeping things moving without adding overhead.

steps.title: Our role flexes to what you need
steps.description: Sometimes we're hands-on support running improvements. Sometimes we're system enablers, developers, coaches, or trainers. The role fits the need.

steps.title: We work on your priorities
steps.description: Your goals, projects, priorities, problems, and needs drive everything we do. We don't bring a pre-set agenda  - we bring expertise and horsepower to what matters most to you.

whyMatters.label: What We Bring
whyMatters.title: Expertise, horsepower, and sustainable systems.
whyMatters.description: We bring three things to every engagement:
points: Expertise  - CI, Lean, Six Sigma, and structured problem solving
Horsepower  - an extension of your team focused entirely on improvements
Sustainable systems  - co-created with your people, transferred, and supported
whyMatters.closing: We don't replace your people. We support them  - so solutions are adopted, sustained, and owned by your team.

ourRole.label: What We Add
ourRole.title: Capabilities that accelerate your improvements
ourRole.subtitle: We add what's needed to move faster.

weProvide.title: Analytics Co-Creation & Scalability
weProvide.description: Dashboards and visuals your team helps build and actually uses

weProvide.title: Application Development & Automation
weProvide.description: Custom tools that fit how your process actually works

ourRole.closing: Together, we build solutions that actually stick.

tools.label: Our Toolkit
tools.title: Tools That Support the Solution
tools.intro: We don't lead with tools. We use them as needed to support the solution. Every engagement is different, and we pull from a proven set of methods to fit what your team actually needs.

feelsLike.title: Our Approach
points: Assessments to understand where you are
Prioritization to focus on what matters most
Improvement planning and execution to get results
feelsLike.closing: The LeanGo team works for you on what's needed.

cta.title: Ready to start improving?
cta.description: Schedule a free session to talk through your goals and see how we can help.
